TopicTitle: (spoilers) i think the magic boulder is back!

Articles.Content:
look at this:

if the picture isnt showing its a crew report from Ike that says:you look up at the sky and see something zip passed!

is it the magic boulder or my transfer stage?
That report has been like that before .24 it may have been there since career mode was introduced

lol...

FALSE ALARM EVERYONE!

Sorry, but that's just the scripted crew report for Ike. Perhaps it's an homage to the bygone Magic Boulder, but unless someone's actually seen the thing I'm pretty sure nothing's changed in that department since last version where it still wasn't back.

EDIT: This forum's too busy! Ninjas everywhere!

*sigh* That has been there since .22, crew reports have nothing to do with anything....Please, actually get a picture of this boulder before you say it's back.

I miss the Magic Boulder;.;

oh sorry iv been playing since 0.19 and i still cant wrap my head around ksp even though i have 717 hours on it

p.s does anyone have a copy of 0.17? i really want to see the magic boulder!
Can't give you a copy of 0.17, but here's a photo of the magic boulder from 0.17:
